title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 December 2011 - XWiki
content:
00:02 <vmassol> has quit  
00:14 <Enygma`> has quit  
00:21 <abusenius> has quit  
02:09 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:06 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
06:00 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <Denis> has quit

07:45 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:58 <CIA-102> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r4cc02f1 / xwiki-enterprise-ui/src/main/resources/Main/Activity.xml : XE-1054: AS broken UI when it has to display a document created in the future ...  
08:19 <CIA-102> tmortagne stable-3.2.x \* r8ff9dfa / xwiki-rendering-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/block/AbstractBlock.java : XRENDERING-161: A totally empty block takes way too much memory(cherry picked from commit 69f3570a425f5d37f399fc9be5a0cdb913f55110) - http://git.io/z2Ejxw  
08:21 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* rcfc7868 / xwiki-rendering-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/block/SpaceBlock.java : XRENDERING-163: SpaceBlock#clone does not clone anything - http://git.io/clUPfg  
08:49 <CIA-102> tmortagne stable-3.2.x \* r14b06ae / xwiki-rendering-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/block/SpaceBlock.java : XRENDERING-163: SpaceBlock#clone does not clone anything(cherry picked from commit cfc78688bd9127919d57d5515a56053b36479c41) - http://git.io/JAVO2Q  
10:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <vmassol> good morning, fyi we seem to have solved the issue that we had when upgrading xwiki.org to 3.2 and 3.3  
11:16 <vmassol> the issue was that in 3.1 we were involuntarily not caching the XDOM in XWikiDocument (well we were but only temporarily) whereas this was somehow changed in 3.2+ (maybe caused by the new display module or some other code)  
11:17 <vmassol> … and we never realized that for a 300K page content the XDOM size was 27MB....  
11:17 <vmassol> thomas committed a fix yesterday to slim it down. Now for a 300K page the new XDOM size is 7MB  
11:17 <vmassol> we can't find any idea to make it smaller  
11:18 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:18 <vmassol> we've just tried xwiki.org on a 3.3snap and the memory looks ok, close to what we had on 3.1 (strangely since I was expecting something like 200MB more at least)  
11:18 <vmassol> (not xwiki.org but xwikiorgdev)  
11:19 <vmassol> so next step is to upgrade xwiki.org with a 3.3snap  
11:19 <vmassol> Forgot to mention that the issue we had when upgrading was an OOM ;)  
11:19 <vmassol> fyi the 300K (27MB xdom) pages are sorin's pages :)  
11:19 <vmassol> (the test report pages)  
11:34 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:50 <+tmortagne>   p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }  note: currently upgrading xwiki.org to lastest 3.3, will probably restart in about 30 min  
12:39 <+tmortagne> restarting xwiki.org for upgrade now  
13:10 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:10 <vmassol> oh :)  
13:11 <+sburjan`> vmassol: glad at least we have some heavy pages to test against :)  
13:11 <vmassol> yes that was useful  
13:11 <+sburjan`> test report pages providing an actual measure of testing :D  
13:18 <vmassol> help me fix broken links! :)  
13:40 <vmassol> the link checker is working well :)  
13:43 <vmassol> tmortagne: seems good to follow perfs: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/performance/?  
13:44 <vmassol> except for the issue with # agents and when we add/modify tests :(  
13:44 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yep looks nice  
13:44 <vmassol> we need to fix http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/678/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.xe/DocumentIndexAttachmentsTabFilterTest/testAttachmentsPane/  
13:45 <vmassol> 1 ui test failing  
13:45 <vmassol> I'll look at it quickly  
13:45 <+tmortagne> restarting xwiki.org again (putting XR jar)  
13:45 <vmassol> plrease restart the irc bot after  
13:45 <+tmortagne> sure  
15:41 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki

15:52 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:56 <evalica> has quit

16:08 <+tmortagne> restarting xwiki.org  
16:10 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:11 <+tmortagne> thanks  
16:14 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* rb3693bd / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki-server-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/xwiki/internal/resources/AbstractExtensionRESTResource.java : Minor codestyle issue - http://git.io/yf6kSw  
16:18 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* ref61044 / xwiki-enterprise-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/XWikiClasses.xml : Fix broken link - http://git.io/5mImUA  
16:25 <+sburjan`> what is going on ?  
16:28 <+sburjan`> cool, unable to edit comments, so link remains broken :)  
16:28 <vmassol> ????  
16:28 <vmassol> why couldn't you edit comments?  
16:29 <vmassol> (sburjan`)  
16:29 <+sburjan`> because I am not the author  
16:29 <vmassol> and?  
16:29 <+sburjan`> let me try from object mode  
16:29 <vmassol> if you have edit rights on the doc you can  
16:29 <+sburjan`> and I don't have a button for editing comments  
16:29 <vmassol> sure but just edit the objects  
16:30 <+sburjan`> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Gallery+Macro?viewer=comments#xwikicomment\_4  
16:30 <+sburjan`> I can't edit this vmassol  
16:30 <+sburjan`> Delete, reply and permalink are the only button I have  
16:30 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/Extension/Gallery+Macro?editor=object  
16:30 <vmassol> now you can :)  
16:31 <vmassol> save with minor edit when you fix a broken link btw ;)  
16:31 <+sburjan`> vmassol: bingo :)  
16:31 <mflorea> has quit  
16:31 <+sburjan`> yepp, minor it was  
16:31 <vmassol> cool  
16:32 <vmassol> sburjan`: actually your fix isn't correct :)  
16:32 <vmassol> you have added a white spae  
16:32 <vmassol> \*space  
16:32 <vmassol> so you changed the content  
16:32 <+sburjan`> yes  
16:32 <vmassol> this is not the right way  
16:32 <+sburjan`> how elce sould I find this ?  
16:32 <vmassol> [[….]]  
16:32 <+sburjan`> \*else. The |)| was seen as part of the link  
16:33 <+sburjan`> ok, going to revert it  
16:33 <vmassol> the inline link notation is just a shortcut of [[...]]  
16:33 <vmassol> it has several limitations  
16:34 <vmassol> 1) you cannot put parameters  
16:34 <vmassol> 2) you it needs to end with a whitespace  
16:34 <vmassol> it's useful when you don't need 1) or 2)  
16:34 <vmassol> otherwise the idea is to use the [[…]] notation  
16:34 <+sburjan`> but I'm still not sure what do you mean by [[..]] ... the xwiki 2.0 link syntax ?  
16:34 <vmassol> it's a link  
16:34 <vmassol> right?  
16:34 <+sburjan`> yes  
16:34 <vmassol> so the notation for link is [[...]]]  
16:34 <vmassol> oops  
16:34 <vmassol> [[...]]  
16:35 <+sburjan`> [[here>>www.google.com]]  
16:35 <vmassol> no  
16:35 <vmassol> that's a link with a label  
16:35 <vmassol> [[whatever]] <— link without a label  
16:35 <vmassol> [[http://xwiki.org]] <— link without a label  
16:36 <vmassol> yep :)  
16:36 <+sburjan`> :)  
16:36 <vmassol> now you know :)  
16:36 <+sburjan`> yes :)  
16:36 <vmassol> give a man a fish....  
16:37 <vmassol> it'll feed him for day, teach him to fish you'll feed him forever (or something like that)  
16:37 <vmassol> ;)  
16:37 <+sburjan`> yeah :D  
16:46 <vmassol> thanks for helping out sburjan`, I was feeling a bit lonely ;)  
16:47 <vmassol> tmortagne: those are for you… :)  
16:48 <vmassol> you added them recently I think  
16:49 <+sburjan`> wow, wrong link in the release notes  
16:52 <+tmortagne> vmassol: it's not real links actually, I should have escaped them probably  
16:52 <vmassol> yes  
16:52 <+tmortagne> fixing them  
16:52 <vmassol> I've been escaping lots of "false" links like this  
16:52 <vmassol> thanks  
17:25 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:26 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <vmassol> strange  
17:29 <vmassol> http://foswiki.org returns:

17:29 <+sburjan`> competition :)  
17:29 <+sburjan`> works for me  
17:30 <vmassol> fun: http://foswiki.org/Community/VirtualBeer  
17:30 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:32 <vmassol> I've pinged them on their irc channel ;)  
17:32 <vmassol> there are a lot more people connected than here…. I'm jealous  
17:33 <vmassol> https://skitch.com/e-vmassol/gc7g8/foswiki  
17:38 <+sburjan`> half of them don't have a free day :)  
17:39 <vmassol> still not bad

19:06 <vmassol> guys what should we do? 1) keep link checking on or 2) turn if off and agree together to do some broken link hunting at a given date and time and then turn it on to do a fixing run?  
19:07 <@sdumitriu> +1  
19:08 <vmassol> +1 for what? :)  
19:09 <@sdumitriu> Ah, for 2  
19:11 <vmassol> ok turning off the link checker now  
19:11 <vmassol> should be off now  
19:21 <+sburjan`> +1 fot 2) also
